CustomField.formula: IF( LEN(ClickToDial__Skype_Username__c) > 0, HYPERLINK("skype:" & ClickToDial__Skype_Username__c & "?call", ClickToDial__Skype_Username__c , "_self\" onclick=\"createTask('"+ ClickToDial__Skype_Username__c +"', '"+ Id +"','"+ $Api.Session_ID +"',false,'"+ $User.Id +"','"+$Setup.ClickToDial__ConfigurationManager__c.ClickToDial__EnableAutoCallLog__c+"');\" "), "No Skype ID")
CustomField.label: Click-to-Call Skype
